mdRecord.dcterms:title: Liure d'architecture de Iaques Androuet du Cerceau: contenant les plans & dessaings de cinquante bastimens tous differens : pour instruire ceux qui desirent bastir, soient de petit, moyen, ou grand estat. : Auec declaration des membres & commoditez .. : Plus, breue declaration de la maniere & forme de toiser la maçonnerie de chacun logis
Livre d'architecture de Jaques Androuet du Cerceau
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Androuet du Cerceau, Jacques, active 1549-1584
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Prévost, Benoît, -approximately 1562
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Imprimé à Paris par Benoist Preuost
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Imprint from colophon on leaf D4.
Captions on plates are in Latin.
Also published in Latin in 1559 according to Brunet.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Bookplate of John, Earl of Bute. Armorial binding with motto "Honi soit [m]al y pense" - possibly the Earl of Rosebery, who used this motto on a bookplate. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 302.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture--Early works to 1800.
Architecture--Designs and plans.
